name: Par 3 Golf Lite
description:
Par 3 Golf Lite is a fast paced golf game with four courses rated par 3. While the computer opponents don't seem to have much trouble sinking the ball in three strokes, your results may vary as you wander the fiendishly undulating greens.

- Four courses set in desert, seaside, mountain, and tropical landscapes.
- Hills, water, sand traps, and tiered greens.
- Male or female player choice.
- Choice of two computer opponents or solo play.
- Top scores leaderboard.

This free version plays the first hole of each course. The remaining 8 holes of each of the 4 courses, 32 holes total, are available through a single In-App Purchase.
